package.name: ncurses
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} case $(uname -m) in x86_64) export CFLAGS="-fPIC" ;; esac ./configure \ --prefix=/usr \ --mandir=/usr/share/man \ --with-shared \ --without-debug \ --enable-widec \ --without-normal \ --enable-pc-files && make
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}
make install mv -v /usr/lib/libncursesw.so.5* /lib ln -sfv ../../lib/$(readlink /usr/lib/libncursesw.so) /usr/lib/libncursesw.so for lib in ncurses form panel menu ; do rm -vf /usr/lib/lib${lib}.so echo "INPUT(-l${lib}w)" > /usr/lib/lib${lib}.so ln -sfv ${lib}w.pc /usr/lib/pkgconfig/${lib}.pc done rm -vf /usr/lib/libcursesw.so echo "INPUT(-lncursesw)" > /usr/lib/libcursesw.so ln -sfv libncurses.so /usr/lib/libcurses.so
